description.value: Note: Rare Availability if acquired from Dark Eldar Settlement. Back-Mounted, Fires special grenades. Anyone in 10 Metres of Impact Point must pass -10 Toughness Test or roll on Fear Shock Table with +10 per DoF. Can't use other grenade types.

system.notes: Rare Availability if acquired from Dark Eldar Settlement. Back-Mounted, Fires special grenades. Anyone in 10 Metres of Impact Point must pass -10 Toughness Test or roll on Fear Shock Table with +10 per DoF. Can't use other grenade types.
